trans-unit.source: Clean every workload pack, including non-orphaned ones. In addition, clean SDK feature bands (versions) that are less than or equal to the current running SDK, as opposed to only the current version.
trans-unit.target: Clean every workload pack, including non-orphaned ones. In addition, clean SDK feature bands (versions) that are less than or equal to the current running SDK, as opposed to only the current version.

trans-unit.source: Remove orphaned workload components that may be on the machine.
trans-unit.target: Remove orphaned workload components that may be on the machine.

trans-unit.source: The path '{0}' of the process is the root path of the drive, which is not allowed, or it is invalid/inaccessible. Please run dotnet in a valid and available path.
trans-unit.target: The path '{0}' of the process is the root path of the drive, which is not allowed, or it is invalid/inaccessible. Please run dotnet in a valid and available path.

trans-unit.source: Workload '{0}' was not removed because it is installed and managed by Visual Studio. Please uninstall this workload through Visual Studio to fully remove it.
trans-unit.target: Workload '{0}' was not removed because it is installed and managed by Visual Studio. Please uninstall this workload through Visual Studio to fully remove it.
